text: The 2006 Geelong Football Club season was the club's 107th season in the Australian Football League (AFL). Geelong finished the regular season in tenth position on the ladder, resulting in the club not qualifying for the finals. ==News== ==Captains== * Captain: Steven King * Vice-Captains: Cameron Ling, Tom Harley, Matthew Scarlett ==Club list== ===Player list=== : Players are listed in alphabetical order by surname, and statistics are for AFL regular season and finals series matches during the 2006
